__e: Only then were women writers recognized too.
He bought a few pieces from me, but I can't say that I really know him.
Look, let's face it, I really didn't expect the complete works of Shakespeare, but maybe just a bad Elizabethan sonnet.
I admire your writing, and I've admired reading the things that you've written about other people and other skeletons you've rattled, but these are two ladies that I love very much.
I loved what they created and I thought something would happen to me too.
But if you destroy their achievements and their history, then it's like they never existed.
